title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even when the dataset is not set.
description: When adding a table report item without setting the dataset, attempting to create a new table group does not display the group dialog.
OB: Currently, when a table report item is added without setting the dataset, attempting to create a new table group does not show the group dialog, and the user is unable to proceed.
EB: The expected behavior is that the group dialog should be displayed even if the dataset is not set. Users should be able to create a new table group without any dependency on the dataset.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Add a table report item.
2. Do not set the dataset for the report item.
3. Try creating a new table group. The group dialog should not appear as expected, indicating the bug.
